kuwetexserver

Class ClientWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • kuwetexserver.ClientWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

     class ClientWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represents client thread. Client is connected to the server and it sends messages. Task of the server is to response to the client in the run method.

      Constructor for new client that is connected to the server via socket.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientWorker

        public ClientWorker(java.net.Socket s,
            int id,
            java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.net.Socket> map)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for new client that is connected to the server via socket.
        Parameters:
        s - - the socket
        map - - reference to the map of clients. Every instance of this class is added to the map.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the client thread. The loop inside is done when the socket is closed.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • response

        private void response(Message message)
        Do some action and sends response message to the client. The action depends on header of the message given as an argument.
        Parameters:
        message - - message from the client.

      • logOutUser

        private void logOutUser()
        When user disconnects this method closes socket (if it is still open). It also deletes the user for the client map.

      • sendMessage

        private void sendMessage(Message message)
        Sends response to the client.
        Parameters:
        message - - the Message class object that will be sent.
